text: ryy anak del phdal kamnaet dl satvalok banteabmk trong nung bangkeut vea sachathmei mdongtiet( now thngai barlok) brasaer cheang? haey anaknea del bratan aoy puok anak nouv leaphosakkar pileu mekh ning phendei noh? tae mean mcheasa phe sa ng del trauv korp sakkar ruom cheamuoy a l laoh ryy? chaur anak( mou ham meat) pol tha chaur puok anakabangheanh phosdo tang robsa puok anak mk brasenbae puok anakchea anak del troemotrauv men noh
